attributes.action: ban religion of any sort so people can concentrate on life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: religion is the cause of a lot of the troubles in the world,  how can something that can be likened to the tooth fairy (i.e  it does not exist) and cause so much misery in the world

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
